reasoning: Fibroblastic type is most common histological variant of osteosarcoma, ~0.3 per 100k globally. Peak incidence in adolescents/young adults. Limited subtype-specific epidemiological data.
source: Mirabello L et al. (2009). Osteosarcoma incidence and survival rates from 1973 to 2004. Cancer. 115(7):1531-1543
